definitions.text: a statement that is emphatic and explicit (spoken or written)
(law) unsworn statement that can be admitted in evidence in a legal transaction
a statement of taxable goods or of dutiable properties
(contract bridge) the highest bid becomes the contract setting the number of tricks that the bidder must make

examples: the government made an announcement about changes in the drug war

definitions.text: a formal expression by a meeting; agreed to by a vote
